metadata.note: Removed military and naval_base from this layer - they now have their own dedicated layer
New layer for military land use - displays at all zoom levels with high contrast teal-grey
Purple-grey fill for ALL aerodrome areas including runways/taxiways - this replaces the old landuse_runway layer
Now shows from zoom 10 with smaller text/icons at lower zoom levels. If source data has min_zoom attributes blocking this, they are now ignored.
Removed aerodrome from this layer - it now has its own dedicated layer
